blocks.content:
**Clients**

I'm currently contracting at The Co-op, working on their Legal Services website. They've extended my contract out until November 2020 so I won't be looking for a new role until September at the earliest.

In the meantime, I created this site because my old one was a pretty-dated WordPress affair and I wanted to start publishing some of the tools I've built for myself over the past few years. I'll be adding them in the near future.

hero.headline: Hi there!
hero.textline: My name is John Peden and I'm a contract front-end web developer based in Manchester.
